description:
ATK Bindings’ free touring jewel. Designed for all enthusiasts for whom weight is certainly an important factor but who aren’t willing to compromise downhill performance. The Snow Pack Proof System® prevents debris buildup under the toe piece locking mechanism. A fully adjustable Freeride Spacer is available, filling the gap between Free Touring and Free Ride categories taking precision and power transmission to an alpine racing binding level.

  • Easy Entry System® that makes the step-in easy and secure with tech compatibility
  • U.H.V.® System (Up-hill Hardness Variator) system lets you change the up-hill locking firmness of the toe
  • Snow Pack Proof System® prevents snow buildup from weighing you down
  • Built-in crampon slots for crampon compatibility
  • Integrated adjustment plate allows 25mm of adjustment for switching boots
  • Heel release system provides a 5 to 12 range of adjustment
  • ELASTIC RESPONSE SYSTEM® improves the binding release performance when under pressure
  • CAM RELEASE SYSTEM® allows for a precise release while providing stable downhill performance
  • Magneto Heel Flaps® provides 5 different walking modes
name: ATK Bindings Raider 12 Free Touring Bindings
